flawed_nl_solution:
If Trevor's brother is 32 years old today then 20 years ago he was = 32-20 = <<32-20=14>>14 years old
If Trevor's brother was 14 years old and he was twice Trevor's age, then Trevor was 14/2 = <<14/2=7>>7 years old
If Trevor was 7 years old 20 years ago, then he must be 7 + 20 = <<7+20=27>>27 years old today
If Trevor is 27 years old today then a decade ago he must have been 27-10 = <<27-10=17>>17 years old
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
